level.text: The Agency may operate a pull tab lottery game. The rules governing the game shall not apply to “charity game tickets” sold by licensed charitable organizations pursuant to the provisions of §1409 of this title.
The price of a pull tab ticket shall be fifty cents (50¢) or any other price designated by the Executive Director from a price schedule adopted pursuant to §500.1.
All rules of this title governing the instant games shall apply to pull tab lottery games and tickets except as provided in §703.4.
A pull tab ticket is a bearer instrument whether or not a signature appears on the back of the ticket, and the prize is payable to the person who presents the ticket for payment.
